p: Damask rose ( Rosa damascena Mill.) is one of the most important species in the Rosaceae family [ 6] with high value products, and its essential oil (EO) is one of the most expensive EOs in the world markets [ 7, 8]. Apart from its use as an ornamental plant in parks, gardens, and houses, R. damascena is principally cultivated for the perfume, pharmaceutical and cosmetic industries [ 9].
